about_the_game:
This is a game in which you infiltrate the "ghost race", a dark business, and enhance the race as a rookie "trapper".

A "trapper" is a forecaster whose job is to set traps and tricks on the course and predict the ghosts' positions, and is paid by understanding the characteristics of the ghosts and suggesting their positions.

Each ghost is unique. It is extremely difficult to get the landing order right, but you must become a full-fledged trapper who can control the ghosts!

-Progression-

The game progresses in the following order: "Select a race venue", "Trap part", "Prediction part", and "Race part".

-The Trap Part-

This is the part where you create a course by placing traps and other objects while protecting yourself from the ghosts. When the time limit is exceeded, or the player announces the end of the game, or loses his/her mind, the game will move to the prediction part.

-Prediction Part-

The player predicts which ghost is likely to finish the course he/she has created in first place, and moves on to the race part.

-Race Part-

It is time for the ghosts to race. The player watches the race and observes the results. The race ends when the top three finishers are identified.

-How to use the rewards-

If you hit the ghosts' landing positions, you will earn more rewards. Rewards earned from races can be used to purchase equipment needed to build the next course.

-About the version-

Currently, the game is being operated as a beta version. We are aiming for ver1.0 through various updates in the future.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700

short_description: This is a Phasmophobia-like horror game in which you, as a rookie trapper, infiltrate a black market "ghost race" to find out what spirits are.
supported_languages: English, German, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
